name: Online Gambling and Games
description: Meta defines online gambling and games as any product or service where anything of monetary value is included as part of a method of entry and prize. We prohibit attempts by individuals, manufacturers, and retailers to purchase, sell, raffle, gift, transfer, or trade these services without prior written permission.

categories.name: Online Real Money Gambling
categories.description: Content selling, trading, depicting or promoting online gambling where monetary value is part of entry AND prize (Money IN + Money OUT)

subcategories.name: Games of Skill
subcategories.description: Skill-based games with real money entry and prizes (quizzes, chess, pool, rummy, fantasy sports, e-sports)
examples: Fantasy sports league with cash prizes
Rummy game with real money entry

subcategories.name: Lotteries / Raffles
subcategories.description: Games where entry is paid and winning depends on chance, includes tombolas

subcategories.name: Charitable Lotteries / Raffles
subcategories.description: Non-profit lotteries/raffles to raise funds for charitable purposes

subcategories.name: Betting / Sports Betting
subcategories.description: Placing wagers on sports, virtual sports, e-sports, horse racing, or non-sports outcomes

subcategories.name: Casino Games / Games of Chance
subcategories.description: Games depending on chance or luck - slots, roulette, blackjack, craps, dice, poker

subcategories.name: Sweepstakes / Prize Draws
subcategories.description: Games requiring real money to play with real money prizes

subcategories.name: Free-to-Play with Payment Required
subcategories.description: Games offering limited trial then requiring payment to continue
examples: Free trial casino game requiring payment after X plays
Game demo that requires purchase to continue

categories.name: Physical Gambling Establishments
categories.description: Physical real-money gambling activity or establishments

subcategories.name: Physical Casinos and Events
subcategories.description: Brick and mortar casinos, casino events, offline poker tournament streaming

subcategories.name: State/Government Lottery
subcategories.description: Official state or government lottery advertised by responsible entity
conditions: Advertised by official entity with direct responsibility

categories.name: Free-to-Play Games with Gambling Context
categories.description: Games simulating gambling with no money entry but opportunity to win money (No Money IN, Money OUT)

subcategories.name: Free-to-Play with Money OUT
subcategories.description: Gambling simulation games that are free to play but offer real money prizes
examples: Free casino game with real cash prizes
conditions: No money required to play (No Money IN)
Opportunity to win money/money's worth (Money OUT)

categories.name: Social Casino Games
categories.description: Gambling simulation games with no opportunity to win money or money's worth

subcategories.name: Social Casino Games (SCG)
subcategories.description: Games simulating gambling (slots, poker, roulette) where users wager in-game currency with no real money prizes
examples: Slot game with only in-game currency
conditions: No opportunity to win real money or prizes

categories.name: Allowed Gambling-Related Content
categories.description: Content that does not violate the gambling policy

subcategories.name: Conditional Prizes on Retail Purchase
subcategories.description: Prizes conditional on product purchase at usual retail price, where gambling is not primary business
examples: Buy cereal, chance to win trip

subcategories.name: Entirely Free-to-Play Games
subcategories.description: Games completely free to play with no paid entry options, even if prizes exist
examples: No paid entry option at all

subcategories.name: In-Person Games Among Users
subcategories.description: Games played in person among Facebook or Instagram users

subcategories.name: Handicappers/Odds Services
subcategories.description: Services providing odds without promoting/facilitating online gambling
conditions: Landing page does NOT promote/facilitate online gambling

labelHierarchy.label: OGG > Real Money Gambling > Casino/Games of Chance
OGG > Real Money Gambling > Betting/Sports Betting
OGG > Real Money Gambling > Games of Skill

exceptions.name: Official State/Government Lottery
exceptions.description: State or government lottery advertised by the entity with direct or exclusive responsibility for running it
exceptions.note: Still labeled but has different treatment

exceptions.name: Retail Purchase Prizes
exceptions.description: Prizes conditional on purchasing product at usual retail price, where gambling is not the primary business

exceptions.name: Entirely Free-to-Play
exceptions.description: Games with no paid entry method at all, even if prizes can be won

exceptions.name: In-Person Games
exceptions.description: Games played in person among Facebook or Instagram users

exceptions.name: Physical Casinos Without Online Redirect
exceptions.description: Physical casino promotion that does not redirect to online gambling
exceptions.note: Allowed if no online gambling facilitation and complies with laws

exceptions.name: Handicappers/Odds Without Gambling
exceptions.description: Services providing odds where landing page does not promote/facilitate online gambling

exceptions.name: Free-to-Play Priority
exceptions.description: When 'free to play' signals are present, they take priority over money IN signals
exceptions.note: Classify as Social Casino Gaming if ambiguous

money_in.description: Signals indicating real money is required to play

money_out.description: Signals indicating real money can be won

both_in_out.description: Terms that indicate both money in AND money out
both_in_out.note: 'Bet' in game/website name with no other context = treat as BOTH IN/OUT

currencySymbols.note: Use Google search or Currency Converter to verify unfamiliar currencies

glossary.online_gambling_gaming: Promotion or facilitation of online games where monetary value can be paid to play AND forms part of prize. Must have real money IN AND real money OUT. Activity must be online.
glossary.games_of_skill: Skill-based games relying on player skill to win: quizzes, chess, pool, rummy, fantasy sports, e-sports
glossary.games_of_chance: Games relying entirely on chance/randomness: slots, roulette, scratch cards, lottery
glossary.lotteries_raffles: Games with paid entry, prize present, winning depends only on chance. Raffle = lottery with range of prizes drawn at same event
glossary.charitable_lotteries: Non-profit raffles to raise funds for charitable purposes
glossary.bingo: Game of chance marking numbers on cards as drawn randomly, winner marks all numbers first
glossary.betting_exchanges: Peer-to-peer betting platforms (Betfair Exchange, Smarkets) vs bookmaker
glossary.sports_betting: Predicting sports results and placing wagers. Includes virtual sports, e-sports, horse racing
glossary.casino_style_games: Games mimicking casinos: dice, card games, roulette, slots, craps, blackjack, dominoes
glossary.fantasy_sports: Choose team of real players from different teams, win points based on their performance. FanDuel, DraftKings, PointsBet
glossary.poker_rummy: Poker: betting on card value. Rummy: forming sets/sequences. Includes Texas Hold'em, Omaha, 7-Card Stud, etc.
glossary.sweepstakes_prize_draws: Real money required to play AND real money can be won
glossary.social_casino_games: Simulated gambling with no opportunity to win money. Users wager in-game currency. Includes poker, slots, roulette simulations
glossary.free_to_play: Games providing significant content without paying or not requiring payment to continue
glossary.monetary_value: Value measured in money terms. Includes cash, digital currencies (Bitcoin)
glossary.affiliates_handicappers: Entities not providing gambling but promoting gambling operators. Includes aggregators, tipster sites, lottery ticket retailers
glossary.money_in: Real money required to play/continue playing
glossary.money_out: Real money able to be won from playing
glossary.promote: Speaking positively, encouraging use, providing instructions, or info on how to obtain

operationalGuidelines.core_rule: Game must have: (1) Real money IN option, (2) Real money OUT option, (3) Online activity
operationalGuidelines.rmg_formula: Money IN + Money OUT = Real Money Gambling
operationalGuidelines.scg_formula: May have Money IN but NO Money OUT with real value
operationalGuidelines.f2p_formula: NO Money IN but has Money OUT
operationalGuidelines.free_to_play_priority: 'Free to play' signals take priority over money IN signals
operationalGuidelines.ambiguity_rule: In case of ambiguity, classify as Social Casino Gaming
operationalGuidelines.bet_in_name: 'Bet' in game/website name alone = treat as BOTH money IN/OUT
